extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • EventSystem

        public EventSystem()
        Blank Constructor

      • EventSystem

        public EventSystem(java.util.ArrayList<Event> eventList)
        Constructor based on deserialization, which input event list and load in system.
        Parameters:
        eventList - An ArrayList that contains all events and their date info.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllEvents

        public java.util.ArrayList<Event> getAllEvents()
        Get all events from the event system.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList that contains all events info.

      • getSortedAllEvents

        public java.util.ArrayList<Event> getSortedAllEvents()
        Get all events that sorted based on the date and start time.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList that contains all events info, and sorted by the date and start time.

      • addEvent

        public void addEvent(java.util.GregorianCalendar c,
                     Event aEvent)
        Add a new event to the system
        Parameters:
        c - Corresponded Gregorian Calendar object, which could be used as date stamp.
        aEvent - Corresponded event info, which contains the event title, start time, and end time.

      • deleteEvent

        public void deleteEvent(java.util.GregorianCalendar c)
        Delete specific events that in a same day based on the date stamp.
        Parameters:
        c - A date stamp, which is also a GregorianCalendar object

      • deleteAll

        public void deleteAll()
        Delete all events that existed in the system.

      • isADayHasEvent

        public boolean isADayHasEvent(java.util.GregorianCalendar dateStamp)
        Check whether a day has event
        Parameters:
        dateStamp - The date stamp that corresponding to a specific date.
        Returns:
        true if the day has event, false if the day does not have event.

      • getEventsInThisDay

        public java.util.ArrayList<Event> getEventsInThisDay(java.util.GregorianCalendar dateStamp)
        Get all events that came from a specific date.
        Parameters:
        dateStamp - The date stamp that corresponding to a specific date.
        Returns:
        The event list that contains all events in a date.
